content: To obtain the Heart of Stone, you need to defeat Shigandang in Fright Cliff in Rockrest Flat in Yellow Wind Ridge. You need all six Buddhas Eyeball items to be able to trigger this fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Heart_of_Stone.md', within the main section titled 'Heart of Stone'.
The content is as follows:
To obtain the Heart of Stone, you need to defeat Shigandang in Fright Cliff in Rockrest Flat in Yellow Wind Ridge. You need all six Buddhas Eyeball items to be able to trigger this fight.
